title: The Return of the Man from U.N.C.L.E.: The Fifteen Years Later Affair

sources.title: Return Of The Man From UNCLE
sources.description: The Return of the Man from UNCLE:Â  The Fifteen Years Later Affair Robert Vaughn, David McCallum

metadata.Plot: The criminal organization THRUSH steals the A-bomb H957 and demands $350,000,000 to be delivered within 72 hours by their former antagonist Solo. So U.N.C.L.E. has to reactivate the super agents Solo and Kuryakin after they were 15 years out of business. Equipped in the usual 007 fashion they start to seek the villains.
metadata.Actors: Robert Vaughn, David McCallum, Patrick Macnee
